item.description:
If you love Jimmy Buffett music, or just want to get out for a Saturday afternoon of fun, you cannot miss Changes In Latitudes. In case you haven't seen them yet, Changes In Latitudes is one of America's premier tribute shows to singer-songwriter Jimmy Buffett, the master of the tropical lifestyle. They are a nine-piece band with a singular plan, to take you to Margaritaville. Every set is a party, with beach balls flying, dancing conga lines, and leis galore. Oh yes, and the music. You know more Jimmy Buffett songs than you think you do, and they'll prove it.
So, if you're ready for a "Latitude Adjustment", break out your grass skirts and Hawaiian shirts, kick off your shoes, and join the beach party. You can learn more about the band at Changesinlatitudes.biz.
Tickets are $15 in advance and can be ordered at IndianRanch.com, or you can buy tickets the day of the event for $20. The show starts at 2:00 so let's plan to meet about noon, get some lunch, and stake out good seats.
item.name: Parrot Head PARTY!!
